description: From Middle English used, equivalent to use +â€Ž -ed.

adjectives.description: used (comparative more used, superlative most used)

entries.meaning: That is or has or have been used.
examples: The ground was littered with used syringes left behind by drug abusers.

entries.meaning: That has or have previously been owned by someone else.

examples: I got used to this weather.

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of use
(intransitive, auxiliary, defective, only in past tense/participle) To perform habitually; to be accustomed [to doing something].
examples: He used to live here, but moved away last year.
The club used to be frequented by locals; then, after the "incident", it used to get raided by the cops.
